utils

Class ReportGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • utils.ReportGenerator

  • public class ReportGenerator
extends java.lang.Object
    The ReportGenerator class is responsible for generating various reports related to park visitations, usage, cancellations, and visitor amount divisions. It supports generating these reports in PDF format, utilizing JFreeChart for graphical representations and iTextPDF for PDF generation.
    Author:
    Tamer Amer, Gal Bitton, Rabea Lahham, Bahaldeen Swied, Ron Sisso, Nadav Reubens.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ReportGenerator

        public ReportGenerator()

    • Method Detail

      • generateUsageReportAsPdfBlob

        public static byte[] generateUsageReportAsPdfBlob(UsageReport report)
        Generates a usage report for a specified park and time period as a PDF blob. The report includes information on park usage, highlighting days and times that did not reach full capacity, along with visual representations through bar charts.
        Parameters:
        report - The UsageReport object containing usage data for the park.
        Returns:
        A byte array representing the generated PDF report, or null if an error occurs.

      • generateCancellationsReportAsPdfBlob

        public static byte[] generateCancellationsReportAsPdfBlob(CancellationsReport report)
        Generates a cancellations report for a specified park and time period as a PDF blob. The report details cancellation metrics, including total cancellations, cancellations over time, and total orders, complemented by graphical line charts for a clearer overview.
        Parameters:
        report - The CancellationsReport object containing cancellation data for the park.
        Returns:
        A byte array representing the generated PDF report, or null if an error occurs.

      • generateVisitsReportAsPdf

        public static byte[] generateVisitsReportAsPdf(VisitsReport report)
        Generates a comprehensive visits report for a specified park and time period as a PDF. The report outlines the distribution of visitor types across different times and their idle times within the park, featuring both tabular data and graphical bar charts for an intuitive understanding of park visits.
        Parameters:
        report - The VisitsReport object containing visitation data for the park.
        Returns:
        A byte array representing the generated PDF report, or null if an error occurs.

      • generateTotalVisitorsAmountReportAsPdf

        public static byte[] generateTotalVisitorsAmountReportAsPdf(AmountDivisionReport report)
        Generates a report on the total number of visitors, segmented by visitor type, for a specified park and time period, rendered as a PDF. The report includes a pie chart visualizing the distribution of different visitor types as percentages of the total.
        Parameters:
        report - The AmountDivisionReport object containing visitor distribution data for the park.
        Returns:
        A byte array representing the generated PDF report, or null if an error occurs.

      • createBarChart

        private static org.jfree.chart.JFreeChart createBarChart(org.jfree.data.category.CategoryDataset dataset,
                                                         java.lang.String charTitle,
                                                         java.lang.String xAxis,
                                                         java.lang.String yAxis)
        Creates a bar chart based on the provided dataset, with customizable chart title, X-axis label, and Y-axis label. This method configures the chart appearance, including label positions and item margins, for optimal readability.
        Parameters:
        dataset - The CategoryDataset containing the data to plot.
        charTitle - The title of the chart.
        xAxis - The label for the X-axis.
        yAxis - The label for the Y-axis.
        Returns:
        A JFreeChart object representing the configured bar chart.
